name: Analyzing Trafficker Patterns
description: Identifying key behaviors, operational methods, and communication tactics used by human traffickers.

cards.title: Recruitment and Grooming Strategies
cards.description: Understanding how traffickers lure and manipulate their victims.
bulletpoints: Common recruitment methods: online grooming, fake job offers, and coercion.
Identifying traffickers' use of psychological dependency and false promises.
The role of family members, trusted friends, and 'Romeo Pimps' in recruitment.
cards.summaryText: Spot grooming fronts, flag dependency manipulation, and watch insider accomplices fueling recruitment.

cards.title: Operational Logistics of Trafficking Rings
cards.description: Mapping out the movement of victims and traffickers across regions.
bulletpoints: Understanding transit routes: airports, highways, border crossings, and seaports.
Identifying high-risk locations used as trafficking hubs or holding areas.
Recognizing the use of fraudulent documentation, fake passports, and visas.
cards.summaryText: Map transit corridors, catalog hub safehouses, and detect forged travel documents.

cards.title: Tracking Digital Footprints
cards.description: How traffickers use technology and online platforms to conduct their operations.
bulletpoints: Dark web forums, encrypted messaging apps, and coded language in public social media posts.
Identifying classified ads and job postings used as fronts for trafficking.
Recognizing cryptocurrency transactions and financial laundering techniques tied to trafficking.
cards.summaryText: Monitor dark-web comms, unmask front ads, and trace crypto flows tied to trafficking ops.
